title: Police investigate shooting death of 15-year-old
content:
Detroit — Police are investigating the Saturday evening shooting death of a 15-year-old boy.
Detroit Police Sgt. Cassandra Lewis said authorities have determined the teen died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound in the incident that occurred just before 7:30 p.m. in the 14000 block of Steel Street in the city’s west side.
Police say its still unclear who the weapon belonged to or if any other individuals were present at the time.
CFerretti@detroitnews.com
